about_the_game:
Experience a peaceful journey focused on exploration, narrative, and puzzle-solving while immersing yourself in beautifully crafted environments. Solve a creative puzzle, and enjoy rich ambient soundscapes and visual storytelling. Behold the gradual growth of a female centaur, her stature and prowess burgeoning as she absorbs the formidable magic of an ancient tree. This game combines the essence of a walking simulator with the immersive storytelling of a visual novel.

Key Features:

- fast to finish - a minimum game-play time of 20 minutes
- a strong weight gain fetish theme
- ass expansion theme
- breasts expansion theme
- immersive storytelling

Gameplay
- Immerse yourself in a unique blend of visual novel and walking simulator.
- Engage in an interactive story as you explore beautifully crafted environments.

Storyline
- Embark on an enchanting journey to help a female centaur regain her powers.

Game Modes
- Enjoy a rich, single-player experience tailored for those who love immersive storytelling and exploration.

Graphics and Art Style
- Delight in stunning 3D graphics with a charming, cartoonish art style that brings the world and characters to life.
- Explore detailed and visually appealing environments designed to enhance your journey.

Sound and Music
- The game features a soothing and atmospheric background score, perfect for complementing the serene and magical setting.

Content Included
- Purchase includes the complete base game, offering a full narrative and exploration experience from start to finish.



MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION

This game does not contain sexual intercourse.
All characters are 18+.

content_descriptors.notes: Fetish themes - weight gain, ass expansion, breasts expansion

name: Tree Eater

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a journey to restore a magical portal by helping a female centaur regain her powers! This game contains fetish themes such as: ass expansion, breast expansion, centaur weight gain.
